subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: The attached budget has been revised to reflect planned activities for the C4D project in the financial year 2010. These activities will include capacity building for journalists, training and mentorship programmes being implemented by the Media Council, Media Awards being implemented jointly with Zain Kenya which will be celebrated on 30th April. Finalization of the Generic C4D curriculum by the University of Nairobi and to support the Government on media policy formulation and self regulation by the media owners. This is in addition to administrative and consultancy activities as factored within the project document.  The total amount projected for these activities in the year 2010 is USD 300,000
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: 8KEN08801 Communication Dev
